attributes.action: instigate an immediate investigation into the grooming gangs
attributes.additional_details: Because we need to know why this has been allowed to happen
attributes.background: Immediately have an enquiry into the grooming gangs and how they have able to abuse physically, sexually and mentally, thousands of vulnerable young girls

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
